Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view

Class CLI

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.view.CLI
All Implemented Interfaces:
UI, PropertyChangeListener, EventListener
public class CLI extends Object implements PropertyChangeListener, UI
This is the main class for the Command Line Interface.
Author:
Dario d'Abate

    • propertyChange

      public void propertyChange(PropertyChangeEvent evt)
      This method will show content based on the event that the client receives, thus it updates the view

      Parameters:
      evt - event occurred due to server

    • communicationWithServer

      public void communicationWithServer() throws ClassNotFoundException, IOException
      This method starts the mechanism of pinging and the mechanism to receive data packets from server. It also sends commands to the server, based on the user's input
      Throws:
      ClassNotFoundException
      IOException
